title: Within the Fade: Volume 1
description: Do you ever wonder what happens within the fade? Desiree Dubois did.This first collection of spicy short stories answers that question and then some with brand new erotic content inspired by Assassins! Accidental Matchmakers and approved by the authors, Jen and Éric Desmarais.Includes: Fantasies, Can’t Get Enough, A Shower Interlude, Celebration, and Urgency.
author: Desiree DuBois
